analysis.description:
CommunicationCreatesValueToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#72-73) shadows:
	- EIP20Interface.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#6-9)

CommunicationCreatesValueTokenLock.release (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#206-219) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#218-219)

CommunicationCreatesValueToken.transferFrom.allowance (local variable @ /unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#110-111) shadows:
	- CommunicationCreatesValueToken.allowance (function @ /unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#150-155)
	- EIP20Interface.allowance (function @ /unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#17-19)

CommunicationCreatesValueTokenLock.release (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#206-219) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(unfreezed[weeksnow] != 1,This week we have unfreeze part of the token) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc1a16e62db6369e1aa520d794026e611c6924b21.sol#209-213)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(unfreezed[weeksnow] != 1,This week we have unfreeze part of the token)
